channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nano Banana AI, Rec Room Halves Staff, Adobe Axes Aero, Red 6 Lands A Whale
item.description: Snap seeks help to launch Specs, Rec Room cuts staff, Adobe shutters Aero AR, Meta adds AI NPCs, and Rokid joins the AI audio smart glasses race.
